title: Region bounded by y=SQRTx and y=x/3 part - b

content.question: Find the volume of the solid generated when R is rotated about the vertical line x = -1.

frqParts.text: Find the volume of the solid generated when R is rotated about the vertical line x = -1.

topic.text: 8.12: Volume with Washer Method - Revolving Around Other Axes
